channel.title: 317 help about npcs! 317
channel.description:
Hey guys... Yesterday I made my first RS Private server (317) and NPC's were coded in server. I DIDN'T move any of them or either spawn any. I was playing server and doing some coding in "client.java" but I DIDN'T touch anything about NPC's. My friend teleported to shops and he asked me where are NPC's. I teleported there and NPC's weren't there. I teleported to home and NPC's weren't there either. So i was thinking maybe they moved somewhere, but ALL NPC's are gone!!! I unpacked source again with no my editing, but NPC's weren't there.
I need help with coding them back to server... I'm new to this so I'll need some extra explanation with it... I only need what files I have to edit and what to edit in them...
Please help
-Vedran

item.title: 317 help about npcs! 317
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

tis isnt client help move to server help.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 help about npcs! 317

item.description:
@CroBunny wrote:

Hey guys… Yesterday I made my first RS Private server (317) and NPC’s were coded in server. I DIDN’T move any of them or either spawn any. I was playing server and doing some coding in “client.java” but I DIDN’T touch anything about NPC’s. My friend teleported to shops and he asked me where are NPC’s. I teleported there and NPC’s weren’t there. I teleported to home and NPC’s weren’t there either. So i was thinking maybe they moved somewhere, but ALL NPC’s are gone!!! I unpacked source again with no my editing, but NPC’s weren’t there.

I need help with coding them back to server… I’m new to this so I’ll need some extra explanation with it… I only need what files I have to edit and what to edit in them…
